Bash(git add:*)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive IPS backtesting with Greeks, sentiment, and AI analysis

## Features Added

### 1. IPS Backtesting System
- Test IPS strategies against 3 years of historical options data (Oct 2022 - Present)
- Greeks-based evaluation (Delta, IV, DTE, Theta, Vega)
- Historical sentiment analysis integration via AlphaVantage API
- Background job execution with real-time progress updates
- 9.8M historical options contracts across 23 symbols

### 2. Backtest History & Results UI
- View/manage past backtests per IPS
- Detailed performance metrics: Win Rate, ROI, Sharpe Ratio, Max Drawdown
- Interactive history modal with clickable past results
- Executive summary explaining Win Rate vs ROI relationship
- Context-rich sentiment correlation insights

### 3. AI-Powered Analysis
- LLM-based optimization suggestions using gpt-oss:20b
- Pattern recognition for winning vs losing trades
- Actionable recommendations for IPS improvements
- Clear explanations of performance metrics
- Sentiment timing insights

### 4. Database Optimizations
- Symbol cache table (350x faster queries: 15s â†’ 42ms)
- RLS policies for backtest data isolation
- Sentiment caching to minimize API calls
- Proper indexing on historical_options_data

### 5. IPS Win Rate Calculation
- Dynamic calculation from actual closed trades
- Real-time stats display on IPS cards
- Separate tracking of prospective/active/closed trades

## Technical Details

### API Endpoints Created
- `/api/backtest/start` - Initiate backtest
- `/api/backtest/[id]/status` - Poll progress
- `/api/backtest/[id]/results` - Get final results
- `/api/backtest/[id]/analyze` - AI analysis
- `/api/backtest/[id]/index-rag` - Train AI on results
- `/api/backtest/history` - View past backtests
- `/api/backtest/available-symbols` - Get testable symbols

### Database Migrations
- `20251028_enhance_backtest_with_sentiment.sql` - Sentiment tracking
- `20251029_create_symbols_cache.sql` - Performance optimization
- `20251029_fix_backtest_rls_policies.sql` - Security policies
- `20251029_fix_backtest_trade_id_constraint.sql` - Schema fix

### Components
- `BacktestButton.tsx` - Full-featured backtest UI
- Side-by-side View/Backtest buttons on IPS cards
- History view with past results
- Real-time progress indicator
- Results display with AI insights

## Bug Fixes
- Fixed async params in Next.js 15 dynamic routes
- Fixed foreign key constraint on simulated trades
- Fixed exit strategies parsing (object vs array)
- Fixed sentiment cache RLS policies
- Fixed status update on backtest completion

EOF
